sentence.Network_en: Catholics pray to Mary as an intercessor.
sentence.Network_cn: 天主教徒向玛利亚祈祷，并把她看作仲裁者。

sentence.Network_en: If it is done both of us have to name intercessor, it is too troubled.
sentence.Network_cn: 那样做咱们双方就得指定仲裁员了.这样多麻烦.

sentence.Network_en: No intimate friend nor intercessor will the wrong - doers have, who could be listened to.
sentence.Network_cn: 不义者,将没有任何亲友, 也没有奏效的说情者.

list.abs: Byzantine art was the first to develop a set of Madonna types-the Madonna and child enthroned , the Madonna as intercessor , the Madonna nursing the child , and so on .拜占庭艺术第一个发展一系列的圣母像--圣母怀抱圣婴坐在宝座上的形象、圣母当调解人的画像和圣母哺喂圣婴的画像等。
